amendment.description: To express support for democratic activity in Hong Kong.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3473 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3473 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S7201; text: CR S7201) To express support for democratic activity in Hong Kong.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3473 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3473 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
